overview: After suffering through an emotional and traumatic heartbreak, a successful and career driven woman decides to never allow love to enter her life again. Just when she has decided to devote her entire existence to her career leaving no room for love, her ex fianc√©e (the one who broke her heart) comes back into her life the same day she meets someone who shows her that a new love just might be the best love. Will she choose passion, chemistry, and history over the simple chance at a new love? Stay tuned.
tagline: True love is a story only time can tell.
title: Make Time 4 Love
